page.shortlink: api objects security object unlock user method
page.description: Allows a user to login to the application.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .T. if the user is unlocked; otherwise .F.

page.discussion: Context.Security.UnlockUser() will allow a user to login to the application. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
